title: My Library
description: Your saved items and followed uploaders, all in one place for easy management and curation.
noFavItemsDesc: Click the star icon on any item to save it here.
noFavUploadersDesc: Click the 'Follow' button on an uploader's profile to add them here.
comingSoonDesc: The ability to save and manage favorite collections is on its way.

bulkDelete.title: Remove Favorites
bulkDelete.message: Are you sure you want to permanently remove {{count}} selected item(s) from your library?
